website_summaries.verdict: The Nike Air Humara 17 brings back the vintage look of the original 90s trail shoe with lighter materials for a more lifestyle approach. Nike kept its iconic structure and added a few upgrades to keep up with today's modern sneakers.Improvements include a mesh-crafted upper with leather overlays and a Zoom Air unit in the forefoot with an encapsulated air unit in the heel, providing a lighter, breathable fit and enhanced overall comfort. It is grounded in the original's trail-based reputation of excellent durability, traction, and protection.
pros: Rooted in its trail-based heritage, the Nike Air Humara 17 is a pair of durable sneakers
This shoe features the addition of the brand's latest technology in air cushioning, specifically the Zoom Air and an encapsulated Air unit, making for a more comfortable pair compared to the original
It is available in several colorway options
Several long-time fans were delighted with this kick's rerelease
An upgraded mesh upper provides breathability and reduced weight
Majority of the shoe owners found the Nike Air Humara 17 to fit true to size
These sneakers are stylish, based on the number of opinions of sneaker fans who are into trail-inspired and chunky shoes
The shoe's outsole features trail-level traction that would work well in the urban setting
An integrated lacing system ensures a secure and lockdown fit
Launched at $140, most buyers thought that it is a great sneaker with excellent value for money
cons: A disappointed online purchaser shared that the colors looked different in photos than when he saw it in person
Half of the reviewers were on the fence with the kick’s design as, according to them, it looked overdone and too bulky

customer_reviews.title: Nike Air Humara
customer_reviews.text: I’m very pleased, as well as satisfied.On how comfortable this size, 13 are.Not really sure how strong they are once water, touches the Nike Air Humara.After warring my shoes, for about 3wk into breaking It in. I conford myself with a tall order of coffee and at least a 12oz., size cup. Anyway, me not paying attention to what I was doing the coffee spille onto my shoes. Didn’t really feel my feet getting wet but yes!!. It was warm and sticky.But wouldn't say it won't hold up on a rainy day, a clean and stylish pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Hannibaltrev

customer_reviews.title: Are they new?
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit great and I love this style. However I won’t be buying from this seller again. They claimed these were new but they were supposed to come with an alternate pair of black laces which were not in the box and only had stuffing in one of the shoes. Overall like the shoes but I wish they would have disclosed that they were missing the other pair of laces.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro

customer_reviews.title: Very good trail shoe
customer_reviews.text: Nike has been my preferred retailer of athletic shoes for decades, but this was my first trail shoe purchase. So far, I really like these shoes. They fit just as well and consistent as any other of my previous Nike shoes over the years. These have a solid grip/tread that does an excellent job on rocks and difficult trails.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this hiking pair for my husband and he is pretty happy about it, fits as expected, beautiful color match and awesome fast shipping. Can’t be more than happy about this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Near Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It's like I've been wearing these shoes all my life; been using Nike products (running shoes especially) for years and these exceeded expectations. Super design and comfort; the color combo an added bonus
customer_reviews.author: vincent francia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent feel when wearing,
customer_reviews.text: Great quality as I didn't know amazon sold Nike. I am now looking daily to see if there are any new Nikes on stock.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Shoe But 2 Sizes Too Small
customer_reviews.text: I love the colors and style but labeled size 12 is really size 10.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Lund

customer_reviews.title: Functional and Stylish!
customer_reviews.text: The Nike Air Humara 17 Mens Trainers are functional and stylish. I use them for all around fitness training. However they are quite stylish and pair well with jeans and shorts. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Hill

customer_reviews.title: Rigid rim cuts into ankle.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is good and fits well but is rigid under the ankle and rubbing some.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors. Well made. I use these for work very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jb
